p:
Antibodies measured by the HI assay are an established correlate of protection for influenza virus infection
10, 20, 21 . Neutralizing antibodies against the dominant surface proteins, hemagglutinin (HA) and neuraminidase (NA), can target different sites on them, and the specificity of the antibody response appears to change with immune history and age
22â€“ 26 . HI assays measure antibodies to HA but not NA, and they disproportionately measure anti-HA antibodies that attach near the receptor binding site toward the top of the HA globular domain.
